alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Teller (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 20 at 1:58PM MDT until July 20 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Teller County in central Colorado... West central El Paso County in east central Colorado... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 158 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Green Mountain Falls, or 13 miles west of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Western Colorado Springs, Manitou Springs, Pikes Peak and Cascade. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
